DOC.brief_summary: A random controlled trail to evaluate the efficacy of migraine standard electroacupuncture formula, and to analysis the regulation of the intensity-effects and to observe the peripheral NO, CGRP and NF-ÐºB expression level of migraine patients after electroacupuncture treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Key Electro-acupuncture Technique on Migraine
DOC.detailed_description: acupuncture group(group A): treated by acupuncture for 20 days, 1 time per day control group(group B): treated by FlunarizineHydrochloride for 20 days, 1 table per day.
DOC.criteria: met the diagnostic criteria for migraine; suffering from migraine attacks; migraine attacks for more than 5 days per month, and lasts for 3 months; voluntarily join this study with informed consents. other systemic, neurological and psychiatric disorders; headache caused by other diseases; not treatment compliance during the study.
